author: crisbeto
message:
docs: make all examples compatible with strict mode (#41999)

Turns on the `strict` compiler flag and resolves the compilation errors in the various AIO examples.

PR Close #41999

files.patch:
@@ -8,7 +8,7 @@

NgModel (two-way) Binding

Current item name: {{currentItem.name}}

- +

@@ -20,7 +20,7 @@

Result: {{currentItem.name}}

+ (input)="currentItem.name=getValue($event)"> without NgModel

@@ -18,13 +18,13 @@

Reactive Form

-
+
Name is required.
-
+
Name must be at least 4 characters long.
-
+
Name cannot be Bob.
@@ -59,7 +59,7 @@

Reactive Form

-
Power is required.
+
Power is required.

@@ -19,13 +19,13 @@

Template-Driven Form

-
+
Name is required.
-
+
Name must be at least 4 characters long.
-
+
Name cannot be Bob.

@@ -2,7 +2,7 @@

Search Npm Packages

Searches when typing stops. Caches for 30 seconds.

- +

-

       "ignore-params"
     ],

     "no-redundant-jsdoc": true,
